# GitHub Actions Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to display build and release status.

## CI Build Status

```markdown
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)
```

**Example:**
![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)

## Latest Release

```markdown
![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
```

**Example:**
![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)

## Release Build Status

```markdown
![Release](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg)
```

**Example:**
![Release](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg)

## Combined Badge Set

Add this to the top of your README.md:

```markdown
# Betty Programming Language

![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)
![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
![Platform](https://img.shields.io/badge/platform-windows%20%7C%20macos%20%7C%20linux-lightgrey)
![.NET](https://img.shields.io/badge/.NET-9.0-512BD4)
```

## Customization

Replace `YOUR_USERNAME` with your GitHub username or organization name.

### Advanced Badges

**Downloads Count:**
```markdown
![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/total)
```

**Issues:**
```markdown
![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
```

**Pull Requests:**
```markdown
![PRs](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
```

**Stars:**
```markdown
![Stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/YOUR_USERNAME/betty?style=social)
```

**Last Commit:**
```markdown
![Last Commit](https://img.shields.io/github/last-commit/YOUR_USERNAME/betty)
```

## Status Page

You can also create a status page by adding all badges together:

```markdown
## Project Status

| Category | Status |
|----------|--------|
| Build (CI) | ![CI](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg) |
| Release (CD) | ![Release](https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/actions/workflows/release.yml/badge.svg) |
| Latest Version | ![Version](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/YOUR_USERNAME/betty) |
| License | ![License](https://img.shields.io/github/license/YOUR_USERNAME/betty) |
| Downloads | ![Downloads](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/YOUR_USERNAME/betty/total) |
| Issues | ![Issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/YOUR_USERNAME/betty) |
| Pull Requests | ![PRs](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/YOUR_USERNAME/betty) |
```

---

For more badge options, visit [shields.io](https://shields.io/)
